meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with small white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The pellitories in the garden bloomed beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of pellitories to decorate the table.
meanings.sent3: The bees seemed to be having a party around the pellitories.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and delicate as a pellitories flower.
meanings.sent5: The gentle fragrance of the pellitories filled the air.

meanings.definition: A skin disease characterized by itching and tingling sensations.
meanings.sent1: After rolling in the grass, he developed pellitories on his skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a cream to soothe the pellitories on her arms.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her pellitories were dancing a tango on her back.
meanings.sent4: The sensation felt like a thousand tiny pellitories crawling on his skin.
meanings.sent5: The itching from the pellitories was driving her crazy.
